snippet: The university has banned Sigma Alpha Epsilon from conducting on-campus activities until August 2016 after learning about inappropriate remarks made at an initiation ceremony.
abstract: Yale University bans Sigma Alpha Epsilon fraternity from campus until August 2016 for violations of university's policy on sexual misconduct, and for efforts to hinder inquiry into February 2014 incident.
lead_paragraph: The university has banned Sigma Alpha Epsilon from conducting on-campus activities until August 2016 after learning about inappropriate remarks made at an initiation ceremony.

headline.main: Yale Restricts a Fraternity After Sexual Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Yale Restricts a Fraternity After Sexual Misconduct
